document.full_text: a downgrade of iceland's credit rating would be unjustified now that the country's economy is improving, finance minister steingrimur sigfusson said on saturday.
document.title: iceland says rating downgrade would be unjustified
lines_and_colors: a downgrade of iceland's credit rating would be unjustified now that the country's economy is improving, finance minister steingrimur sigfusson said on saturday.
